name: Diamond Treasure Line
description:
Diamond Treasure Line is another stunning and classico match3 puzzle game !
There are many crazy puzzles that are created from beautiful sapphire gems. It's an addictive game for everyone.
Features
- 2 modes: Classic and Arcade
- Arcade mode: 200 well-designed levels in different worlds
- Amazing stunning magical effects (such blast mania, lighting splash, boom explosion)
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
- Match 4 same jewels to create boom pop item
- Match 5 or more jewels quest to create a multicolour Bejeweled blitz
